name: @didi-js/didi
description: A transpiler for JavaScript and Typescript, transforming CommonJS modules into distinct ES Modules.

scripts.publish-readme: git add ./README.md && git add ./docs && git commit -m 'update readme' && git push
scripts.build-all: yarn build-lib-didi && yarn build-devserver && yarn build-cli-client && node ./build/dist-package-json.js 0.0.0
